mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bas_demo_ca ( name,
id_par,
creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name},
#{idPar},
#{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )
INSERT INTO bas_demo ( name, id_demo_ca, fg_active, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{idDemoCa}, #{fgActive}, #{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )

INSERT INTO bas_eva_tag ( name,
id_media,
id_demo, cd_eva_asse, fg_show_make, fg_show_exec, fg_active,
sort,
creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name},
#{idMedia},
#{idDemo}, #{cdEvaAsse}, #{fgShowMake}, #{fgShowExec}, #{fgActive},
#{sort},
#{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )

INSERT INTO bas_medical_tag ( name,
id_media,
id_demo, cd_med_asse, fg_show_make, fg_show_exec, fg_active, sort, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name},
#{idMedia},
#{idDemo}, #{cdMedAsse}, #{fgShowMake}, #{fgShowExec}, #{fgActive}, #{sort}, #{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )

INSERT INTO bas_demo_asses ( name,
par_dimemsion,
id_demo, weight, fg_system_algorithm,
id_algorithm,
score_upper,
score_lower,
score_default,
fg_active, sort, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name},
#{parDimemsion},
#{idDemo}, #{weight}, #{fgSystemAlgorithm},
#{idAlgorithm},
#{scoreUpper},
#{scoreLower},
#{scoreDefault},
#{fgActive}, #{sort}, #{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE bas_demo_ca SET name = #{name},
id_par = #{idPar},
fg_active = #{fgActive},
operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_demo_ca = #{idDemoCa}
UPDATE bas_demo SET name = #{name}, id_demo_ca = #{idDemoCa}, fg_active = #{fgActive}, operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_demo = #{idDemo}

UPDATE bas_medical_tag SET name = #{name}, id_media = #{idMedia}, id_demo = #{idDemo}, cd_med_asse = #{cdMedAsse}, fg_show_make = #{fgShowMake}, fg_show_exec = #{fgShowExec}, fg_active = #{fgActive}, sort = #{sort}, operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_tag = #{idTag}

UPDATE bas_eva_tag SET name = #{name}, id_media = #{idMedia}, id_demo = #{idDemo}, cd_eva_asse = #{cdEvaAsse}, fg_show_make = #{fgShowMake}, fg_show_exec = #{fgShowExec}, fg_active = #{fgActive}, sort = #{sort}, operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_tag = #{idTag}

UPDATE bas_demo_asses SET name = #{name}, par_dimemsion = #{parDimemsion}, id_demo = #{idDemo}, weight = #{weight}, fg_system_algorithm = #{fgSystemAlgorithm}, id_algorithm = #{idAlgorithm}, score_upper = #{scoreUpper}, score_lower = #{scoreLower}, score_default = #{scoreDefault}, fg_active = #{fgActive}, sort = #{sort}, operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_dimemsion = #{idDimemsion}

update bas_medical_tag set sd_process = #{sdProcess},
process_serialno = #{processSerialno},
process_serialno = null,
operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_tag = #{idTag}
mapper.select: SELECT id_demo_ca AS id , id_par AS pId , name, 1 as open FROM bas_demo_ca WHERE fg_valid = '0'

select bet.id_tag, bet.name, bet.id_media, bet.id_demo, bet.cd_eva_asse, bet.fg_show_make, bet.fg_show_exec, bet.fg_active, bet.fg_valid, bet.sort, bet.creator, bet.gmt_create, bet.operator, bet.gmt_modify, bm.path from bas_eva_tag bet left join bas_media bm on bet.id_media = bm.id_media where bet.fg_valid = '0' and bet.id_demo = #{idDemo} order by bet.sort
SELECT bd.id_demo, bd.name FROM bas_demo bd WHERE bd.fg_valid = '0' AND bd.fg_active = '1'
SELECT id_dimemsion AS id , par_dimemsion AS pId , name, 1 as open, weight as ext FROM bas_demo_asses WHERE fg_valid = '0' and id_demo = #{idDemo} order by sort

SELECT id_dimemsion, name, par_dimemsion, id_demo, weight, fg_system_algorithm, id_algorithm, score_upper, score_lower, score_default, fg_active, fg_valid, sort, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify FROM bas_demo_asses WHERE id_dimemsion = #{idDimemsion}

SELECT bmt.id_tag , bmt.fg_show_make, bmt.fg_show_exec, bmt.name , bm.name as pName , bmt.cd_med_asse , bm.path , bma.script, bma.script_exec, bmt.sort, bmt.sd_process, IF(bmt.process_serialno is null,bmt.sort,bmt.process_serialno) as process_serialno FROM bas_medical_tag bmt LEFT JOIN bas_media bm ON bmt.id_media = bm.id_media LEFT JOIN bas_med_asse bma ON bmt.cd_med_asse = bma.cd_med_asse WHERE bmt.fg_valid = '0' AND bmt.fg_active = '1' AND bmt.id_demo = #{idDemo} ORDER BY IF(bmt.process_serialno is null,bmt.sort,bmt.process_serialno)

SELECT bet.id_tag , bet.fg_show_make, bet.fg_show_exec, bet.name , bet.cd_eva_asse , bm.path , bea.script FROM bas_eva_tag bet LEFT JOIN bas_media bm ON bet.id_media = bm.id_media LEFT JOIN bas_eva_asse bea ON bea.cd_eva_asse = bet.cd_eva_asse WHERE bet.fg_valid = '0' AND bet.fg_active = '1' AND bet.id_demo = #{idDemo} ORDER BY bet.sort

SELECT a.id_med_case FROM faq_med_tag a left join bas_medical_tag c on a.id_tag = c.id_tag left join bas_med_asse b on c.cd_med_asse = b.cd_med_asse WHERE a.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} and b.cd_med_asse = #{cdMedAsse}

SELECT count(1) FROM faq_med_case_inques_list bi left join bas_inques_ca bic on bi.id_inques_ca = bic.id_inques_ca WHERE bi.id_med_case = #{extId} and bi.fg_valid = '0'
AND bi.id_inques_ca = #{idInquesCa}
AND bi.des_inques like concat('%',#{desInques},'%')
AND (bi.des_inques like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bic.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))

SELECT count(1) FROM faq_med_case_body_list bb left join bas_body_ca bbc on bb.id_body_ca = bbc.id_body_ca WHERE bb.id_med_case = #{extId} and bb.fg_valid = '0'
AND bb.id_body_ca = #{idBodyCa}
AND bb.des_body like concat('%',#{desBody},'%')
AND (bbc.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bb.des_body like concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))

SELECT count(1) FROM faq_med_case_inspect_list bii left join bas_inspect_ca bic on bii.id_inspect = bic.id_inspect WHERE bii.id_med_case = #{extId} and bii.fg_valid = '0'
AND bii.id_inspect = #{idInspect}
AND bii.na_item like concat('%',#{naItem},'%')
AND (bic.name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or bii.na_item like concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))
